content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll be interested in the prime location of this apartment. How much are you considering to pay for a monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's way below my expectations. This apartment is brand new and in the heart of the city. I'm looking for a more generous offer. What else are you willing to pay for the amenities and the location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 600 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your effort, but 600 euros is still not reflecting the true value of this property. This is a luxurious, modern apartment with all the latest amenities. I'm sure you can see the potential here. Are you willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can go up to 650 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, you're getting closer, but I can't settle for less than 700 euros per month. This is a very competitive price for the market, considering the quality of the apartment and its central location. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 700 euros per month sounds fair. I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that, Max. We have a deal at 700 euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
